title: BEWITCHER Announces US Tour With DEATHCHANT & PERSEKUTOR
description: Kicking off on March 14 at the Bottom Of The Hill in San Francisco, CA.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: Kicking off on March 14 at the Bottom Of The Hill in San Francisco, CA.
text: Bewitcher is bringing some speedy thrash metal to your town (or a town near you) thanks to a handful of upcoming US tour dates. The tour kicks off on March 14 at the Bottom Of The Hill in San Francisco, CA and features both Deathchant and Persekutor as support. Get those dates below and get your tickets here. "Few bands are as aligned with us in their love of all things Motörhead and Sabbath than Deathchant," said Bewitcher bassist A. Magus. "When the opportunity came to join forces for a spring run to Hells Heroes and back, we couldn't say no. To make this tour even more killer, Romania's snow obsessed riff-lords Persekutor will be tagging along. Expect nothing short of ice-cold beer soaked heavy tunes and hellish good times. PARTY ON!" 3/14 San Francisco, CA Bottom of the Hill3/15 Sacramento, CA Cafe Colonial3/16 San Diego, CA Brick by Bric3/17 Los Angeles, CA Lodge Room3/18 Phoenix, AZ Nile Undergrou (Bewitcher only)3/20 Houston, TX Hell's Heroes (Bewitcher only)3/21 Dallas, TX TX Tea Room3/22 Austin, TX The Ballroom3/23 Oklahoma City, OK 89th Street3/25 Kansas City, MO Record Bar3/26 Chicago, IL Reggie's3/27 Milwaukee, WI X-Ray Arcade3/28 St. Paul, MN Turf Club3/29 Fargo, ND Aquarium3/31 Denver, CO Hi-Dive4/2 Richland, WA Ray's Golden Lion (no Persekutor)4/3 Seattle, WA El Corazon (no Persekutor)4/5 Portland, OR Twilight Cafe & Bar (no Persekutor)5/17 Vancouver, BC Modified Ghost Fest (Bewitcher only) Want More Metal? html:
Bewitcher is bringing some speedy thrash metal to your town (or a town near you) thanks to a handful of upcoming US tour dates. The tour kicks off on March 14 at the Bottom Of The Hill in San Francisco, CA and features both Deathchant and Persekutor as support. Get those dates below and get your tickets here.

"Few bands are as aligned with us in their love of all things Motörhead and Sabbath than Deathchant," said Bewitcher bassist A. Magus. "When the opportunity came to join forces for a spring run to Hells Heroes and back, we couldn't say no. To make this tour even more killer, Romania's snow obsessed riff-lords Persekutor will be tagging along. Expect nothing short of ice-cold beer soaked heavy tunes and hellish good times. PARTY ON!"
